short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An open source minimalist exchange rate calculator. support 160+ currencies, 500+ crypto currencies

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hotrade Calculator is an opensource project since 2019, planing support more platforms in the future.

sofar, support 160+ legal tender, and 500+ cryptocurrency,

chose your want to dashbord, focus on your favorties. our pursuit is "simple & clean"

auto refresh the lastest exchange rates when app launch or "realtime"(per 5mins) hand refresh.
